搞不懂1.  2.
2012-3-23 13:44 上传




路飞的帖子看过了 总而言之看不懂
什么是Start.bat 还有什么是java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar nogui

replies.author: DR.MC.ztz
replies.txt_content: 一开始我也看不懂...多玩玩就可以

replies.author: asdasd1031
replies.txt_content: 我不能取消正版认证！求解 或者教我怎么取消正版认证

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content:
Download CraftBukkit's latest build: CraftBukkit - Recommended BuildPut the .jar file in the directory you'd like the server to run fromOpen notepad and type:
@ECHO OFFSET BINDIR=%~dp0CD /D "%BINDIR%""%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar craftbukkit.jarPAUSE Note: If you are running java in 32-bit mode on a 64-bit machine, change %ProgramFiles% to %ProgramFiles(x86)% If you are running Java 7, type this instead: 
@ECHO OFFSET BINDIR=%~dp0CD /D "%BINDIR%""%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar craftbukkit.jarPAUSE4. Save the document as RUN.bat (not as a .txt) 5. Double Click RUN.bat and you're away! 6. When you're done toying, issue "stop" command in console.
1下最新的craftbukkit
2把.jar文件放进你想要的文件夹
3打开文本打；

@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar
PAUSE 复制代码注：你的机子要是64位但是你用32位JAVA你要把%ProgramFiles%弄成%ProgramFiles(x86)% 
要是你是JAVA7：

@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar
PAUSE 复制代码
4把这个文件存为RUN.bat（不是.txt)
5点RUN.bat开始
6在关他的时候打stop


我注（...）：“-jar craftbukkit.jar”这段要是你服务器找不到途径的话，换成你下载的.jar的名字
